programme.title: Lockup: Colorado: Extended Stay
programme.desc: When Travis Trani took charge in 2008 he oversaw the implementation of several new policies; the restrictions on movement were among the toughest; inmates from the six different housing units could no longer freely move throughout the prison.

programme.title: Lockup Special Investigation
programme.sub-title: Lake County Juvenile Justice: Kenneth, Kentrell, Devon
programme.desc: For some kids, the revolving door of lockup seems to snag one generation after the next; 17-year-old Kenneth and 14-year-old Kentrell, have 10 brothers and sisters, a father in prison and a mother with a criminal record for public nuisance.

programme.title: Lockup Special Investigation
programme.sub-title: Lake County Juvenile Justice: Aaron, Ayryana, Marie
programme.desc: Figuring out what contributes to kids getting locked up is not an exact science; over the past six years, Aaron has become a familiar face at Lake County Juvenile; with his 18th birthday just days away, he finds himself back behind bars.

programme.title: Lockup Special Investigation
programme.sub-title: Lake County Juvenile Justice: Kevin, Kymyada
programme.desc: Juvenile Court Judge Mary Beth Bonaventura observes that an indicator of what will happen in a child's life can be found by looking at the family and how supportive it has been; the kids seem to know this, too.

programme.title: Lockup Special Investigation
programme.sub-title: Lake County Juvenile Justice: Rodrick, Morris
programme.desc: More than three thousand kids pass through the juvenile courts in Lake County, Indiana each year; here, consequences can range from a sleepless night in detention to the ultimate punishment for kids who keep coming back: Boys' School.

programme.title: Lockup Special Investigation
programme.sub-title: Lake County Juvenile Justice: Michael, Ricardo, Miguel
programme.desc: Ricky has spent a total of 266 days in Lake County, and another 16 months at a residential placement facility in Nevada; when he didn't return to his placement in Nevada after a weekend home pass, Ricky was picked up on a bench warrant.

programme.title: Lockup: Colorado: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Welcome to Limon Correctional Facility, a level 4 prison that houses many of Colorado's most dangerous inmates; while visiting Limon Correctional, the Lockup crew is greeted by angry inmates and the cell extraction team is called in to help.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A Brooklyn investment manager starts the longest running Ponzi scheme in history; a stock trading computer program which is supposed to deliver an incredible return.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A former champion basketball player's schemes land him in prison and his mother kicked out of her home.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: When an epidemic of teenage nicotine addiction breaks out across the country, some people ask whether Juul's founders are intent on saving lives or targeting the next generation.

programme.title: Lockup: New Jersey: Extended Stay
programme.sub-title: Thicker Than a Bowl of Oatmeal
programme.desc: A gang leader has his authority challenged by another inmate but questions arise over whether the challenger is who he says he is; in the women's wing, one inmate's personality divides her housing unit; before long, verbal altercations turn violent.

programme.title: Lockup: New Jersey: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A threat against an officer leads to a major shakedown; an alleged gang leader becomes a magnet for trouble; a high-speed chase ends with the discovery of a 21-year-old murder victim and now the jail must deal with her cold-blooded killer.

programme.title: Lockup: New Jersey: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A police shootout leaves a paroled inmate in the hospital with 14 bullet wounds and two other men are arrested for their connection to him; a female inmate arrives with what she says is a hair salon mishap, but officers suspect something else.

programme.title: Lockup: New Jersey: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A new inmate tries to adjust to life in jail, but finds himself with a target on his back and the victim of violence; a drug smuggling scheme is uncovered in the jail's mailroom and a suspect is identified.

programme.title: Lockup: New Jersey: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A dangerous drug makes a comeback in the city of Hackensack, but this time with an "all in the family" twist; inmates are provided with cameras to record their intimate thoughts.

programme.title: Lockup: New Jersey: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A familiar face struggles to escape the jail's revolving door, but there's a catch; another inmate has pled guilty to manslaughter, but now in an unusual legal twist, he may have to stand trial for murder.

programme.title: Lockup: Cincinnati: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A jail shakedown recovers a huge stash of contraband; a young couple is charged with robbery and murder, but as judgment day approaches, one of their lives might depend on the choices of another.

programme.title: Lockup: Cincinnati: Extended Stay
programme.desc: After an inmate is assaulted, the jail identifies a suspect but the violence doesn't stop there; a young inmate gets a crash course on how to survive in jail, as he prepares to deal with the consequences of his actions.

programme.title: Lockup
programme.desc: Angola Penitentiary in Louisiana.
